accounts.views.delete_fake_orders(request)¶

accounts.views.delete_old_table_orders(request)¶

deletes all table orders older than specified number of days since the user has created them. :param request: Post contains days: int :return:

accounts.views.randomString(stringLength)¶

accounts.views.random_date(start, end)¶

This function belongs to https://stackoverflow.com/questions/553303/generate-a-random-date-between-two-other-dates It is just used to generate random orders This function will return a random datetime between two datetime objects.

accounts.views.remove_user_from_group(user, group_name)¶

0 PM’ does not match format ‘%m/%d/%Y %I:%M %p removes user from a group :param user: :param group_name: :return:
